regulation_text: The FLSA mandates that employees who work over 40 hours a week must be paid overtime at a rate not less than time and one-half their regular rates of pay.
atom_rules: Pay overtime at 1.5x regular rate for hours over 40 per week.

regulation_text: Employers are required to post and keep posted a notice explaining the Fair Labor Standards Act in a conspicuous place in all of their establishments.
atom_rules: Post FLSA notice in a visible location.

regulation_text: The Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA) requires employers to report all work-related fatalities within 8 hours and all work-related inpatient hospitalizations, amputations, and losses of an eye within 24 hours.
atom_rules: Report work-related fatalities within 8 hours and hospitalizations within 24 hours.

regulation_text: Under the Age Discrimination in Employment Act (ADEA), employers cannot discriminate against individuals who are 40 years of age or older based on age.
atom_rules: Prohibit age discrimination for individuals 40 years or older.

regulation_text: The Genetic Information Nondiscrimination Act (GINA) prohibits employers from requesting or using genetic information to make employment decisions.
atom_rules: Do not use genetic information in employment decisions.

regulation_text: The Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA) requires employers to protect the privacy of employee health information.
atom_rules: Protect privacy of employee health information.
